dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 707 IH: Deport Illegal Voters Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Strong introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make unlawful voting an aggravated felony.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Deport Illegal Voters Act of 2025.

section.header: Expanding the definition of aggravated felonies under the Immigration and Nationality Act

subsection.text: Section 101(a)(43) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1101(a)(43)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (T), by striking and at the end;
by redesignating subparagraph (U) as subparagraph (V); and
by inserting after subparagraph (T) the following:

subparagraph.text: voting in violation of any Federal, State, or local constitutional provision, statute, ordinance, or regulation; and

paragraph.text: Section 212(a)(10)(D) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1182(a)(10)(D)) is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: Any alien who has voted in violation of any Federal, State, or local constitutional provision, statute, ordinance, or regulation is inadmissible.

paragraph.text: Section 237(a) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1227(a)) is amended by striking paragraph (6).
